title: What are the features of a Chromebook? - Quora

response.answer_text: Chromebooks work well and is suitable for most PC users. Here's why:1. Email - You can use any webbased email2. Productivity - Word processing, spreadsheets, presentations. For best results, use Google Suite files i.e. Docs, Sheets, Slides. Comes with Forms and Draw3. Note Taking - Keep and Docs allows you to take note offline if necessary4. Photos/ Videos - Access these via USB drive or online via photos.google.com5. Books/ Reference - Use Google Play Books or Amazon Cloud Reader. It is possible to make books/ reference material available offline6. Web Surfing7. Google Play Apps - Install these apps on the newer Chromebooks. This significantly increases the utility of Chromebooks8. Bonus - Fast startup, long battery life (about 8 hours) and relatively secure. Google has offered a reward of $100,000 to anyway that can hack Chrome OS. No one has claimed the prize yet
